name: Chatbots
description: AI-powered conversational agents that can understand and respond to natural language inputs. These tools range from customer service assistants to advanced language models capable of complex reasoning and content generation.

name: Image Generation
description: AI tools that create images from text descriptions or prompts. These systems can generate realistic photos, artwork, illustrations, and designs based on natural language inputs.

name: Writing
description: AI-powered writing assistants that help create, edit, and improve written content. These tools can generate blog posts, marketing copy, emails, and other text-based content.

name: Productivity
description: AI tools designed to enhance personal and team productivity. These include note-taking apps, task managers, and workflow automation tools with AI capabilities.

name: Video
description: AI-powered video creation, editing, and enhancement tools. These include text-to-video generators, video editors with AI features, and tools for creating AI avatars and presentations.

name: Coding
description: AI tools that assist with programming and software development. These include code generators, AI pair programmers, and tools that help debug and optimize code.

name: Marketing
description: AI tools designed for marketing professionals. These include content generators, social media assistants, and tools for creating and optimizing marketing campaigns.

name: Voice & Audio
description: AI tools for voice synthesis, text-to-speech, and audio generation. These include voice cloning tools, AI voiceovers, and tools for creating and editing audio content.
